["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"CTAN (The Comprehensive TeX Archive Network) 是所有 TeX 排版系统相关材料的汇集地，收录了编译引擎、宏包及字体等的源代码与说明文档。目前，绝大多数 LaTeX 宏包会被上传至 CTAN 核心站点，随后同步到遍布全球的各个镜像。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"本文提供了 TeX Live 和 MiKTeX 两大主要发行版的镜像配置方法。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"tex-live","children":"TeX Live"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"TeX Live 是目前使用最为广泛的 TeX 发行版，支持 Windows、Linux 和 macOS。其中，在 macOS 上发行的版本称为 MacTeX。"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"安装方法","children":"安装方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"TeX Live 发行版的常见安装方法可以参考如下文档。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/info/install-latex-guide-zh-cn/install-latex-guide-zh-cn.pdf"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["除每年更新的完整版 ISO 镜像以外，CTAN 镜像中也包含在线安装器。这种方法可以使安装的所有宏包均为最新版本，但受网络连接状况影响较大。操作方法为（",["$r","em",null,{"children":"很可能需要管理员权限"}],"）："]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"下载 install-tl.zip 并解压缩"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/systems/texlive/tlnet/install-tl.zip"}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Windows 下双击运行其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"install-tl.bat"}],"。如果有图形化界面，可以在进入安装器前的右下角按钮指定使用镜像源。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Linux 下使用如下命令："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"perl install-tl --repository {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/systems/texlive/tlnet"}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"切换镜像","children":"切换镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["TeX Live 使用的 CTAN 镜像源可以从内置的包管理器 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"tlmgr"}]," 更改（",["$r","em",null,{"children":"很可能需要管理员权限"}],"）。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在命令行中执行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"tlmgr option repository {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/systems/texlive/tlnet"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可永久更改镜像源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果只需要临时切换，可以用如下命令："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"tlmgr update --all --repository {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/systems/texlive/tlnet"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"update --all"}]," 指令可根据需要修改。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"miktex","children":"MiKTeX"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"MiKTeX 发行版的特点在于仅安装用户需要的宏包，节省了磁盘空间占用，但在部分实现细节上与 TeX Live 有所出入。该发行版支持 Windows、Linux 和 macOS。"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"安装","children":"安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["MiKTeX 仅提供 Windows 和 macOS 的独立安装包，前往",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://mirrorz.org/app/TeX%E6%8E%92%E7%89%88%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%9F","rel":"nofollow","children":"TeX 排版系统下载页"}],"即可。在 Linux 下的安装请参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://miktex.org/howto/install-miktex-unx","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"使用镜像","children":"使用镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"MiKTeX 使用的 CTAN 镜像源可以从内置的 MiKTeX Console 图形化应用程序进行切换，也可以使用如下命令："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"mpm --set-repository={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/systems/win32/miktex/tm/packages/","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"pkgsrc","children":"pkgsrc"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本节供 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/pkgsrc/","children":"pkgsrc 帮助"}],"使用"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"MASTER_SITE_TEX_CTAN= {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}]]}]
